metadata.title: CVE-2023-35959 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple OS command injection vulnerabilities exist in the decompressionfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted wave file can lead toarbitrary command execution. A victim would need to open a malicious fileto trigger these vulnerabilities.This vulnerability concerns `.ghw`decompression.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
